front.title: Transport of Incident Detection Message Exchange Format version 2 (IDMEFv2) Messages over HTTPS

abstract.t: The Incident Detection Message Exchange Format version 2 (IDMEFv2) provides a way to describe any incidents detected on cyber and/or physical infrastructures. The format is agnostic so it can be used in standalone or combined cyber (SIEM), physical (PSIM) and availability (NMS) monitoring systems. IDMEFv2 can also be used to describe cyber and physical potential threats (CTI/PTI). IDMEF improves situational awareness by facilitating correlation of multiple types of events using the same base format thus enabling efficient detection of complex and combined cyber and physical attacks on critical infrastructures. If approved this document would obsolete RFC4767.
